name: Engine Keeper (Feyola)
description:
This is a Ludum Dare 46 title.

Control devices in the spacecraft compartment to prevent the engine shutdown. Your spaceship is in the race, and you need to take over your opponents! Use resources wisely and don't disappoint the captain.

 In our game, you should manage the engine room of the spaceship so it KEEPS FLYING. You can see the messages from the captain and a line with 3 rockets on the wall. Your ship is green! Every time you pump energy into the engine, green ship flies forward.
